original_title: Big Hands Oh Big Hands, Let It Be Bigger and Bigger
overview: This story takes place in a city, in which all of the citizens have very big hands. One child, however, is special. He has tiny hands, and his head full of peculiar thoughts. The boy constantly talks to people about these thoughts, but they dislike his long-windedness and eventually ignore him. He is very lonely. The only he does is talking to the walls.
title: Big Hands Oh Big Hands, Let It Be Bigger and Bigger
